# tf.keras.backend.softsign

``` python
tf.keras.backend.softsign(x)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/backend.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.11/tensorflow/python/keras/backend.py).
